common.somethingWentWrongDesc:
Sorry for the inconvenience caused.
We are working on it.
Stay connected.
common.failed: Something went wrong. Please try again after some time.
common.healthMinistry: Ministry of Health and Family welfare, Govt of India
common.cdc: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Govt of India
common.crowdsource: Crowdsourced list of resources and essentials across India
common.aboutusQs2: What are your sources? How is the data gathered for this project?
common.aboutusAns2: API is available at Covid19india.org API. We would love it if you can use this data in the fight against this virus.
common.aboutusAns3: We are a group of dedicated volunteers who curate and verify the data coming from several sources. We extract the details, like local and community transmissions, travel history and status. We never collect or expose any personally identifiable data regarding the patients.
common.aboutusQs4: Why are you guys putting in time and resources to do this while not gaining a single penny from it?
common.aboutusAns4: This is absolutely non-profitable website. Today it's someone else who is getting infected; tomorrow it could be us. We need to prevent the spread of this virus. We need to document the data so that people with knowledge can use this data to make informed decisions.

place.unsafePlaceTitle: Keep yourself safe if you live or travel nearby to these locations.
